member.name: T:Altova.Types.ISchemaType
member.summary: Common interface for all schema-types.

member.name: T:Altova.Types.SchemaTypeException
member.summary: Base class for all exceptions thrown in the context of schema-types handling.

member.name: T:Altova.AltovaException
member.summary: Base class for all exceptions thrown by functions of the Altova-library..

member.name: T:Altova.Types.StringParseException
member.summary: The given string could not be parsed to the value of the given schema-type. There are formating (or other) errors.

member.name: T:Altova.Types.NotANumberException
member.summary: This exception is thrown when trying to convert a string not containing a valid number to a number.

member.name: T:Altova.Types.TypesIncompatibleException
member.summary: Two schema-types are not compatible and can't be converted from one to the other regardless the contained value.

member.name: T:Altova.Types.ValuesNotConvertableException
member.summary: The two schema-types may be compatible, but the contained value cannot be converted to the other schema-type.

member.name: T:Altova.UserException
member.summary: Exception that can be thrown by the user.

member.name: T:Altova.TraceTarget
member.summary: Interface to print TRACE and result output generated by the application.

member.name: T:Altova.TraceProvider
member.summary: Abstract class to be derived by the application for printing TRACE- and result-output generated by the application.

member.name: T:Altova.Xml.FaultException
member.summary: Fault exception propagates fault as a node back to main WS method
